name: Lahoucine Aboulhassan
bio: Hello World! I am a front-end web developer. I hope you check my works and help me with your advice and notes. Thank you :)
about_me: Hi there visitor, my name is Lahoucine Aboulhassan, My friends call me Hassan for short, I'm 25 years old, from Morocco. Anyway, you might already know that, it's everywhere on my portfolio LOL, I study at the IBN ZOHR University in Agadir city. after 4 years of education, I got my certificate in Computer Science.

I like to watch movies, tv shows, and anime, I like to read manga, novels, and interesting articles especially the scientist one. I do photography and I love taking pictures of everything I find cool, I've been told I am bad at it, but I don't care, I love doing it. you can see that in the section below. Also traveling to new places and make new friends is something that I enjoy doing a lot.

I also like coding, so I started to learn more about the web and I got the chance to get to know that there is more to learn and to work on. After a lot of tutorials and online courses, I chose to deep in on the front end. I learned the basics of HTML, CSS, ES6 and i'm learning the Vue js and React js frameworks, I already build some projects using these technologies. So hopefully you enjoy my portfolio and please don't forget to check my GitHub repo and please if you have some notes, or an available internship you know where to find me, and thank you :).

experiences.desc: I know this has nothing to do with web development, but that's the only experience I've had, for now, Hopefully, in the future, there will be more. So It's a nursery garden of tomatoes, it was a job that I tend to work every summer vacation since my first year in high school 2011, I learned many things from it about plants and also about how to work with groups and many other things. it was a nice experience.
